bientity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on either or both the '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.
bientity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on either or both the '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.

held_item_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the item used by the '**actor**' entity for right-clicking the '**target**' entity.
held_item_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the item used by the '**actor**' entity for right-clicking the '**target**' entity.

result_item_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the item that is given to the '**actor**' entity.
result_item_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the item that is given to the '**actor**' entity.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by either or both '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by either or both '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.

item_condition.description: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by the item used by the '**actor**' entity for right-clicking the '**target**' entity.
item_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified actions will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by the item used by the '**actor**' entity for right-clicking the '**target**' entity.

hands.description: Determines if the power should be activated if the '**actor**' entity used the specified hand(s). Accepts `"off_hand"`, `"main_hand"` or both
hands.markdownDescription: Determines if the power should be activated if the '**actor**' entity used the specified hand(s). Accepts `"off_hand"`, `"main_hand"` or both

result_stack.description: If specified, this item stack will be given to the '**actor**' entity.
result_stack.markdownDescription: If specified, this item stack will be given to the '**actor**' entity.

action_result.description: Determines the result of the 'use' action.
action_result.markdownDescription: Determines the result of the 'use' action.

priority.description: Determines the execution priority of the power.
priority.markdownDescription: Determines the execution priority of the power.

type.description:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/action_on_being_used)

Executes an action when a player "uses" (right-clicks) the entity that has the power.

Type ID: `origins:action_on_being_used`

!!! note

    In the context of this power type, the '**actor**' entity is the entity that did the "usage" action (right-click) while the '**target**' entity is the entity that has the power.
